alert.note: Alert for Bond; Clinton; Madison; Marion; Randolph; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 21 at 2:33PM CDT until October 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: .Red Flag Warning extended into southwest Illinois until 7 PM today. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR CRITICAL FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHWEST ILLINOIS... The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a Red Flag Warning for critical fire danger, which is in effect until 7 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 064 Bond IL, Fire Weather Zone 069 Clinton IL, Fire Weather Zone 070 Marion IL, Fire Weather Zone 074 Washington IL, Fire Weather Zone 079 Randolph IL and Fire Weather Zone 100 Madison IL. * TIMING...Noon through 700 pm. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 79.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Bond; Clinton; Madison; Marion; Randolph; Washington
